data.actual_result: A message in **CLIENT** pops up saying you can't talk in Voice channel
data.expected_result: A message in Overlay pops up saying you can't talk in Voice channel
data.short_description: [Overlay] Joining a channel you cannot talk in doesn't pop up "You can't talk" message in overlay but main Client!
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game with Overlay enabled - Create / Join a Voice channel with no permission to speak via the overlay
